mapper.insert: insert into ecs_ad (ad_id, position_id, media_type, ad_name, ad_link, start_time, end_time, link_man, link_email, link_phone, click_count, enabled, ad_code) values (#{ad_id,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{position_id,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{media_type,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{ad_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ad_link,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{start_time,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{end_time,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{link_man,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{link_email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{link_phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{click_count,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{enabled,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{ad_code,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.update: update ecs_ad set position_id = #{position_id,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, media_type = #{media_type,jdbcType=TINYINT}, ad_name = #{ad_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ad_link = #{ad_link,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, start_time = #{start_time,jdbcType=INTEGER}, end_time = #{end_time,jdbcType=INTEGER}, link_man = #{link_man,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, link_email = #{link_email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, link_phone = #{link_phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, click_count = #{click_count,jdbcType=INTEGER}, enabled = #{enabled,jdbcType=TINYINT}, ad_code = #{ad_code,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where ad_id = #{ad_id,jdbcType=SMALLINT}
mapper.select: select ad_id, position_id, media_type, ad_name, ad_link, start_time, end_time, link_man, link_email, link_phone, click_count, enabled, ad_code from ecs_ad where ad_id = #{ad_id,jdbcType=SMALLINT}
